item.title: A common regression mistake in choosing error distributions
item.description: library(dplyr); library(ggplot2) ## ## Attaching package: 'dplyr' ## The following objects are masked from 'package:stats': ## ## filter, lag ## The following objects are masked from 'package:base': ## ## intersect, setdiff, setequal, union knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo=FALSE) I recently saw several related errors come up in multiple presentations.

item.title: Lambdas Should Contain Less Information than their Output
